title: Smokestack Lightnin'
lyrics: Ah-oh, smokestack lightnin'Shinin', just like goldWhy don't ya hear me cryin'?A-whoo-hooo, ooooWhoooWhoa-oh, tell me, baby,What's the, matter with you?Why don't ya hear me cryin'?Whoo-hooo, whoo-hoooWhoooWhoa-oh, tell me, baby,Where did ya, stay last night?A-why don't ya hear me cryin'?Whoo-hooo, whoo-hoooWhoooWhoa-oh, stop your train,Let her, go for a rideWhy don't ya hear me cryin'?Whoo-hooo, whoo-hoooWhoooWhoa-oh, fare ya wellNever see, a you no moreA-why don't ya hear me cryin'?Oooo, whoo-hooo, whoo-hoooWhoooWhoa-oh, who been here baby since,I-I been gone, a little, bitty boy?Girl, be onA-whoo-hooo, whoo-hoooWhooo
